article_title: California Wants to Give More Undocumented Immigrants Health Coverage
article_text:
Thank you for your interest in licensing Fortune content. Please find information on various licensing contacts below and choose the one that best suits your needs:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

3. To license text only photocopies of Fortunearticles as print or digital handouts in academic settings, or in academic coursepacks, please contact the Copyright Clearance Center at www.copyright.com

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Sy Mukherjee

twitter.description: Proposed legislation in California would allow as many as 390,000 adult undocumented immigrants to purchase health coverage through the state’s Obamacare insurance marketplace, dubbed Covered...
twitter.title: California Wants to Give Undocumented Immigrants Access to Obamacare

article_metadata.keywords: obamacare, affordable care act, health care reform, health insurance, covered california, undocumented immigrants, healthcare, health coverage, jerry brown, barack obama, hhs, cbo
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Affordable Care Act, California, healthcare, Obamacare, pubdesk, undocumented immigrants
article_metadata.description: A proposed bill would open up California's Obamacare marketplace to as many as 390,000 undocumented immigrants. Chances are, it will pass.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: California Wants to Give Undocumented Immigrants Access to Obamacare
article_metadata.news_keywords: obamacare, affordable care act, health care reform, health insurance, covered california, undocumented immigrants, healthcare, health coverage, jerry brown, barack obama, HHS, CBO
article_metadata.sailthru.description: But the state would need permission from the White House.

og.description: But the state would need permission from the White House.
og.title: California Wants to Give Undocumented Immigrants Access to Obamacare
